findings.title: DoS caused by a large number of loops
findings.description: The user can pass in the gombocAddressList array through the mintMany function to mint the LT. If the length of gombocAddressList is large, it will cause DoS because of the number of for loops.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The user can pass in the gombocAddressList array through the mintMany function to mint the LT. If the length of gombocAddressList is large, it will cause DoS because of the number of for loops.

findings.title: No event logs for approval status toggle in Minter contract
findings.description: In the Minter contract, the caller can toggle the approval status for mintingUser, but there are no event logs.

findings.title: No event logs for approved smart contract wallets in VotingEscrow contract
findings.description: In the VotingEscrow contract, the owner can set an external contract to check for approved smart contract wallets, but there are no event logs.

findings.title: No event logs for adding new reward tokens and setting distributors in PoolGomboc contract
findings.description: The owner can add new reward tokens and set the distributor of the reward, but there are no event logs.

findings.title: Missing zero address check
findings.description: When modifying important addresses in the contract, it is not checked whether the incoming address is a zero address.

findings.title: Missing return value check
findings.description: When transferring ERC20 tokens, the return value after the transfer is not checked. If return false, the logical should be reverted.
